Package ru.nsu.fit.oop.veber

Interface Graph<V,​E>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - elem that can be in vertex (vertexes can be associated with any type)
    E - elem that can be in edge (edges can be associated with any type)
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdjList, AdjMatrix, IncMatrix
    public interface Graph<V,​E>
    This interface contains all basic methods to work with directed simple graphs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds edge to graph.

        boolean addVertex​(Vertex<V> vertex)
        Adds vertex to graph.
        Parameters:
        vertex - - vertex that we add
        Returns:
        true - if vertex was added, false - if vertex was not added.

      • setVertexElement

        void setVertexElement​(Vertex<V> vertex,
                      V newElem)
        Set the element of the current vertex.
        Parameters:
        vertex - - to what vertex we set element
        newElem - - what element will be actual element

      • getVertexDegree

        int getVertexDegree​(Vertex<V> vertex)
        Method returns degree of current vertex.
        Parameters:
        vertex - - from what vertex we count degree
        Returns:
        degree of the vertex (count of edges those are connected to it)

      • getVertexNumber

        int getVertexNumber()
        Method returns number of vertexes in graph.
        Returns:
        number of vertexes

      • getEdgesNumber

        int getEdgesNumber()
        Method returns number of edges from current vertex.
        Returns:
